title: Kandy Esala Perahera
description: A grand cultural festival with dancers, drummers, and decorated elephants honoring the Sacred Tooth Relic.

title: Galle Literary Festival
description: Writers and thinkers gather in historic Galle Fort for talks, workshops, and performances.

title: Ella Trail Run
description: A scenic trail run through tea estates, bridges, and misty hills.

title: Turtle Conservation Release
description: Join local conservationists for a baby turtle release and marine education session.
